item.title: Shrinking giants: North Atlantic right whales getting tinier...
item.description:
apnews.com
One of the giants of the deep is shrinking before our eyes, a new study says. The younger generation of critically endangered North Atlantic right whales are on average about three feet (one meter) shorter than whales were 20 years, drone and aircraft data show in a study in Thursday’s journal Current Biology.

item.description:
